actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to provide land-grant status for the College of Agriculture and Mechanic Arts of the University of Puerto Rico, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Declares that the College of Agriculture and Mechanic Arts of the University of Puerto Rico shall be considered a land-grant college established for the benefit of agriculture and mechanic arts in accordance with specified provisions of Federal law. Authorizes the appropriation of a specified amount of money to Puerto Rico in lieu of donations of public land or land scrip for the endowment and maintenance of such colleges.

titles.title: A bill to provide land-grant status for the College of Agriculture and Mechanic Arts of the University of Puerto Rico, and for other purposes.
